name: TopTrumpsQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open Top Trumps Quiz”
”Alexa, start Top Trumps Quiz”
”Alexa, launch Top Trumps Quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: top trumps quiz
des:
LIKE TOP TRUMPS QUIZ? 
TRY OUR NEW ALEXA SKILL DISNEY TOP TRUMPS QUIZ

Get ready to challenge yourself and compete on the global monthly leaderboard to see if you are the best of the best.

Every day, you will have the chance to answer up to 3 questions and score points based on your playing streak for the month.

For example, if you are on a 7-day playing streak, that means you will score 7 points for each question you answer correctly that day.

If you get a question wrong, then that’s it for the day, but you have the option to unlock the next question.

ALEXA HAVING TROUBLE UNDERSTANDING YOUR ANSWER
Try just saying A, B or C instead
If you're using an Echo Show, try tapping on the answer

Top Trumps Quiz is optimized for Echo devices with a screen, such as the Echo Show and Fire TV, but it also works great on all Alexa enabled devices.

For any questions, support or feedback contact: support@adassainnovations.com
